Articles.Content:
This is where I will be posting all spacecrafts I make! I hope you guys like them!

Vehicle Assembly Building:

Spaceplane Hangar:

The Sprite:

The Sprite is the perfect little jet for anywhere in the world you wish to go. Be it the North Pole, Kerbin Easter Eggs, "the other runway," or the middle of the ocean! You can even put it on a rocket and take it to any planet you want, just so long as it can get Intake Air! To liftoff, turn on SAS and throttle to a recommended amount of about 2/3 throttle. This plane is very stable, and launches at an angle for preemptive altitude. It handles very lightly, so I suggest activating Fine Controls when flying the Sprite.

Download The Sprite

Edited May 7, 2013 by Blaze22039
In the description I called it a jump jet, but it is not VTOL
Due to confusion (and my noobiness), could any mods viewing this add the tag [Rocket Builder] to this? Thanks in advance c:
It's a very interesting compact design.. very nice.
